lines.text: You don't need a reason to die, Frank. Just one to live.
The only reason I open my trap is to keep my teeth from chattering.
Take it easy. I'm not going to hurt you.
That's more like it. Now calm down!
I wonder if there's anyone else left in town.
There's probably a few. You ever try to empty a sack of sugar?
What's that got to do with it?
Some of the grains always stick to the sack, like the two of us.
